title.narrative: OUTPUT 4.3: EDUCATION IN EMERGENCIES

description.narrative: Output 3: By 2024, children and adolescent girls and boys in targeted locations affected by emergencies, especially crises, access and are retained in schools and learning centers, which contributes to Adolescent Empowerment, Children With Disabilities, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equitable Access To Quality Education (Covid), Gender Discriminatory Roles And Practices, Learning Outcomes, Learning Outcomes (Covid), Skills Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2024, more children (5â€“17 years), especially adolescent girls, acquire competencies through access to quality and inclusive learning.
